name: gimp-mcp
description: GIMP MCP Server - Professional Image Editing via MCP
long_description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI agents to perform professional image editing operations using GIMP (GNU Image Manipulation Program). Provides comprehensive image manipulation capabilities including layer management, filters, transforms, and batch processing.
